Protocol description:
n_sensors: number of horizontal and vertical sensors after interpolation
(optional)

bars: location of the cursor (in X and Y)

trace: ? (sorry, don't know what this was supposed to do; does not seem to do
anything useful)

range: minimum and maximum value to display (not entirely sure how I'm using
this, but I think the visualization is clipped to these values)

view: algorithm can show several data types; most interesting is "delta" (or
"raw" when debugging the sensor)

pause: either 0 or 1. If 0: continuous calibration of background level is
performed on those pixels where the delta of background level - current level is
below a certain limit. If 1: continuous calibration is disabled

mode: either "negative" (for pressure sensing) or "positive" (for presence
sensing)

fps: number of frames per second (currently about 12 - 15; can hopefully be
increased much more)

data: the actual data is in a one dimensional array (sorry; a 2D array would
have been nicer). In python I can convert it to a 2D array with data =
numpy.array(decoded['data']).reshape((n_sensors[1], n_sensors[0]))

state: one dimensional array that shows the state of each pixel. State is as
follows:
1: calibrating
2: released (difference between raw value and background value is less than a
certain threshold; pressure on pixel is very low or 0)
3: approaching (difference between raw value and background value is higher in
between two thresholds; not very useful for pressure sensing but useful for
touch sensing)
4: released_to_pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold, but not for
long enough; pixel is likely to be touched
5: pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold and for a longer time; pixel
is touched
6: pressed_to_released: difference is lower than 2nd threshold but not for long
enough; pixel is likely not touched any more

example of a json msg:

{"data":[21.8438,18.3008,19.4883,20.8848,24.0703,23.9492,25.6406,27.8047,30.0625,30.4512,30.6445,30.8828,31.1875,32.7207,34.2852,35.6953,36.0547,36.8789,37.625,39.7324,43.4297,42.1719,40.4336,40.9707,41.3203,43.0469,45.6211,46.75,48.8984,49.0039,49.2461,49.3516,49.4844,55.5273,61.9062,69.2012,76.5156,72.9766,69.4531,65.8359,63.3047,60.1328,56.9492,53.8027,50.7188,51.0859,51.5156,52.0605,52.6875,52.2871,52.2227,51.2715,49.875,46.6426,43.5977,40.5742,40.4141,36.5625,32.1094,30,27.9609,15.3613,16.0547,17.2139,18.417,19.6211,21.3965,23.1113,25.0356,26.9805,27.7412,27.8213,27.873,28.0098,29.0449,30.1904,31.0264,31.3809,33.0962,37.7793,42.4551,47.25,48.2856,49.3564,50.5186,53.7344,55.9624,59.748,60.9673,63.6445,63.7266,63.8643,63.9917,64.0254,68.0322,72.4658,77.4355,82.8789,79.0312,75.8271,73.0601,70.7676,65.6797,60.2881,54.7261,49.1738,50.0791,50.5352,50.6631,51.0938,50.6416,50.6777,49.8857,49.3633,45.9385,42.9082,39.9224,37.1152,34.1206,31.2793,29.0791,26.9004,12.5156,14.002,15.5566,17.1211,18.6797,19.4902,20.3242,21.4951,22.832,23.3555,23.9746,24.5732,24.9414,25.1006,25.3594,26.7803,29.6523,34.0879,39.3496,45.209,51.1602,54.4219,57.7207,62.4512,67.5938,69.9707,72.8652,75.6865,78.5195,78.5488,79.0625,79.6191,79.1133,81.1768,83.5801,85.6992,88.7383,85.291,82.543,80.3682,78.2812,70.9805,63.1016,55.3164,48.0938,48.3408,49.041,49.6309,50.5703,49.7031,49.2285,48.6025,48.9141,45.54,42.6875,39.6543,36.3672,33.4375,30.4824,28.1064,25.7539,10.6035,11.9536,13.9375,15.7681,17.6309,18.23,18.499,18.7534,18.9766,19.1919,19.8281,20.436,21.3945,23.3457,25.3623,27.7798,31.0059,37.1289,44.1641,49.9756,55.877,61.9219,67.8945,74.5664,81.4512,84.4834,87.4746,90.4141,93.4824,94.2173,95.4111,96.1206,96.8262,94.6714,94.6689,94.2559,94.6055,91.8242,89.8809,87.9468,86.0625,76.0552,66.0156,56.4985,47.7129,47.7534,48.1406,48.0601,48.3887,48.0059,47.8584,48.0146,48.2637,44.9668,41.7451,38.5591,35.4102,32.708,30.9287,27.7368,25.0547,12.5859,14.1016,12.7695,14.2031,17.1797,16.9316,16.5703,17.0371,21.
